website_summaries.verdict: A good budget alternative spray gel for more neutral results. Good for both women and men.
pros: Uses a formula that is gentler on damaged and aging hair
Good for splitting and fraying hair strands
Has a good deal of volume after it sets and dries in just a couple minutes
Dries without leaving any noticeable buildup
cons: The hair loses some natural shine and manageability after use

customer_reviews.title: Good for Aging Thinning Hair
customer_reviews.text: Using it for my thinning, scraggly, older-looking hair that I unaffectionately call witches hair. Got a couple of compliments when I used volumizing shampoo, this product, blow-dryed hair, hot-rolled hair, then applied stronghold hairspray. It had much improved volume plus some shine. I will keep using this. A bonus: the directions on the back informed me that it provides heat protection. Don't forget to shake the bottle before using it each time.
customer_reviews.author: Joghog

customer_reviews.title: Soft volume that lasts.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many products for my fine hair. But everything seemed to make my hair stiff, sticky or just didn't hold. This stuff is just plain amazing. It adds tons of volume without any product feel. And it lasts for days. I've never had such great results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for Extra Volume
customer_reviews.text: Does a really good job of adding volume to your hair whether it is because you have very fine hair, or if as happens with so many off us as we get older, it is thinning a bit. Also compliments most gels/muds very well if you are looking for extra hold. But if used alone doesn't leave your hair stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bismarck

customer_reviews.title: Made for fine hair; easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love the product; have written a review before about its hold and texture. I also use their Shaper Zero Gravity hairspray to finish, and it all brushes out easily. Be sure to follow the directions, and I think you will be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: JTXan

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Like this better than Toni & Guy Bodify which is what I use prior to my colorist recommending Sebastian. Which it was a better price. I can purchase same price at the Salon. If you are considering this, be sure you buy the "Volupt" (for volume) formula and not the texturizing formula...there are 2.
customer_reviews.author: SparkyTX

customer_reviews.title: This is a product I often go back to.
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this product is that it is not sticky. I recently tried another well known brand and found it way too sticky - although it had more volume. This product does not have a lot of volume but I like the feel of it and the spray allows you to keep it off of your hands.
customer_reviews.author: nasus

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I had been using another brand and wanted to find something less expensive so tried this one. While it isn't less expensive as the packaging is smaller, I find that it works just fine for my fine hair. My hair will curl when I use this product. I like it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Fergie

customer_reviews.title: Did not like at all!
customer_reviews.text: Too much for my hair. Seemed to make it look less silky and unhealthy,. Weighed it down and the ends looked dry when I used it. FYI... use only if you have very fine thin hair I’m assuming and sparingly. I. Thought it would act like a volumizing hair spray, but not at all! $11 wasted since can’t be returned!
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Great volume!
customer_reviews.text: Great volume, but you loss shine and manageability -- that said, I still love the volume I get, I just have to work with my hair a little more to style it. The volume achieved it very noticable but I don't feel or see any long term damage at all.
customer_reviews.author: DeAquitaine

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: This was an order for someone else but she said it deserves 5 stars. She loves this and says nothing else works for her hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Not the most exciting product in town!
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine hair, so I am always looking for products that will add body to my hair. This is a good, but not a great product. It didn’t make my hair stiff, which was a plus, but it didn’t make that much difference.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer.p cohen

customer_reviews.title: works!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I find that when I use it in spurts it really works well. I use in along with the Sebastian Volupt Shampoo and Conditioner and find that the combination does provide my fine, thin hair with a bit more volume than usual. I cannot use this product daily, as I have an extremely sensitive scalp and it seems to irritate my scalp after several uses. So I use it every other week for a few days in a row, and I am pleased with the results. I did hear that Sebastian was discontinuing this product so I did buy myself an extra one to save!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special!
customer_reviews.text: This volume spray gel was just...meh! Not really anything special. I have used Sebastian products before and thought I would just give this a try. I am not sorry I tried it, I am just not planning on buying it again because it didn't really do anything special for me. I have lots of thin hair and I am always looking for more volume as I believe most girls are... I find the best results are with a mousse. So, it was fun to try but I will stick with the 100 or so other unused products I already have before I re-visit this product.
customer_reviews.author: saavy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great styling spray
customer_reviews.text: Great styling spray and leaves no buildup. Can still run fingers through hair.
customer_reviews.author: mom2four

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have used it for years and it never loses its effectiveness. I use the thickener gel and this before blow drying and then the web paste after my hair is dry. Nothing beats these Sebastian products and most items are $5 - 6, less than at the salon or beauty supply store.
customer_reviews.author: Living for Chocolate & Books

customer_reviews.title: GREAT volume, but makes my scalp itch
customer_reviews.text: This spray gives great volume, but it made my scalp itch.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Denizen

customer_reviews.title: Really works, is long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the hair volumized at the top-part/crown of the head and doesnt go flat. Amenable to styling with blow-drier or hot iron when sprayed on base of hair near the roots. Also doesn't make my hair fall and is a light formula. Doesn't feel heavy on my very fine hair. One star off because it doesn't do as well on dry hair and also not great for tips of hair in terms on texture. Would definitely recommend this to anyone with fine hair and sensitive skin, who is looking for volume on the top and sides in particular. The pricing is perfect too.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Paula

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my fine here
customer_reviews.text: I can’t seem to buy this at stores anymore so thank goodness for Amazon. I love the spray
customer_reviews.author: Grandy Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great volumizer that doesn't way down hair
customer_reviews.text: Spray and air dry or blow dry and you are golden.
customer_reviews.author: Shaz

customer_reviews.title: Good for fine thin flat hair
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It's good for thin fine hair because it doesn't weigh it down and it gives it a little boost with some texture.
customer_reviews.author: GandVmommie

customer_reviews.title: Works okay.
customer_reviews.text: I like this spray, but I am not sure I will continue to purchase it as there are other sprays on the market that work just as well. Price vs. results.
customer_reviews.author: D.Nehls

customer_reviews.title: Sebastian VOLUPT Hair Gel
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't stand to be without it. It gives my hair a fuller look. If you have thin hair, this will help you out.
customer_reviews.author: Antonia Baccari

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan for Sebastian last 15 years. Thank you, guys keep doing great products
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used the product for a long time. The price on Amazon was less than what I pay in the salon. My hair has more body and better staying power when I use the gel. It doesn't build up on my hair or make it sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can't live without this stuff! No one ever believes I have thin hair!
customer_reviews.author: J_VA

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: For someone who has no body in their hair this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Betty B

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Don't use too much or hair gets crunchy. Just a few sprays gives great volume and shine.
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I know this product is specifically for volume, but I really like to slick my hair back in a pony tail, and regular gel just made my hair look crunchy and oily. I use this as a hairspray almost every day because it has great hold and my hair still looks clean after use!!
customer_reviews.author: Hidden

customer_reviews.title: I have better results with the Volupt Spray rather than hair spray
customer_reviews.text: Keeps hair tamed. I have better results with the Volupt Spray rather than hair spray..
customer_reviews.author: Susie Kay

customer_reviews.title: Spray Gel by Sebastian/hair
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in this particular product...I have used Sebastian "Volupt spray gel" and it worked so well...This Unisex root gel does not hold a set in my hair at all. Disappointed with the results...just not the same ...I would not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Nightengale Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for volume and doesn't weigh hair down
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I have been using it for several years to give my hair some lift and volume. Easy to use, just shake and spray on roots, and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for thin hair
customer_reviews.text: If you want body, and curl to stay in your hair, this is the product. However, do not use too much, as it will make your hair gummy and dull.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Bloomenrader

customer_reviews.title: Lift is good!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Only spray at the roots otherwise hair might feel little crusty. I have long hair and boy oh boy, it gives lift that I havent gotten with any other product so far. Lasts me at least 6 months. The price on here is amazing. The salon charges $18
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like this product Sebastian aVoluptVolume Building Spray Gel. My hair stylist sells it for more money of course. It is so easy for me to use and its not sticky.
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Too sticky and didn't provide the gentle body I was looking for for my fine Hair.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me. Too sticky and didn't provide the gentle body I was looking for for my fine Hair.
customer_reviews.author: Rosebud

customer_reviews.title: Adds body
customer_reviews.text: Good product that adds body and helps with styling with blow dryer and round brush.
customer_reviews.author: WendyB

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Really pumps up the volume, but I do have to wash my hair now more. But it us worth it.
customer_reviews.author: mandytoo

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works well, but I still haven't found the right product that makes my hair FEEL completely natural. Maybe I'm just asking too much for my type of hair, but I want both volume and shine.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle L

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: This product adds volume to my thin hair. Sebastian Volupt spray is easy to use, just spray lightly & blow dry.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Mayorca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect leave in product
customer_reviews.text: Never found a better volumizer. Hair is thicker and shinier and more manageable with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Laura

customer_reviews.title: This is my first time trying the Sebastian spray gel ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying the Sebastian spray gel and I really do notice more volume in my hair. Will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Riggenbach

customer_reviews.title: dry with a large brush and I' m good to go for the whole day no matter what ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy it all the time for my short, limp and sparse hair -I spray it all over my head, dry with a large brush and I' m good to go for the whole day no matter what the day has in store for me!
customer_reviews.author: L W LLoyd

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Product & Service!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product very much. It's light on the hair and makes for great styling for the natural curly look--it's leaves the hair flexible and soft. The package arrived fast and was packaged well. I would buy from the person again.
customer_reviews.author: cathkitty70

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It works fine on my fine, thin hair and gives it added body.
customer_reviews.author: lucky lady lynn

customer_reviews.title: Love this product and was glad I could find it ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and was glad I could find it at a great price and did not have to run around to find it. It gives my hair just the right amount of volume and is not sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Bergman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Gives good texture to my baby fine hair. Gets even better when I haven't washed in a day or two and has dry shampoo working with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: T in AL

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. It gives your hair volume and body. It is also a much better price than going to a salon to buy it. Plus delivered to my door, what else could I want.
customer_reviews.author: K. Manigault

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: With thinning hair, I really appreciate the volume it builds up and makes it look that much thicker!!
customer_reviews.author: Antonia Baccari

customer_reviews.title: Expected it to increase volume.
customer_reviews.text: It works fairly well. Doesn't cause itchiness like a few other products I have tried. Will probably order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure that I do actually get a lot of volume when I use this, per se, and I have to use another product on my ends. But, I do feel like it gives me pretty good lift at my roots.
customer_reviews.author: MQ

customer_reviews.title: I keep going back to this for volume. Only ...
customer_reviews.text: I keep going back to this for volume. Only thing is I think it has a tendency to build up so I use a clarifying shampoo about once a month.
customer_reviews.author: Justina M. Semuta

customer_reviews.title: Don't use anything else anymore!
customer_reviews.text: My stylist had me try this & I was hooked! My hair is thin & fine, dry at the ends and sometimes oily at roots. I have NO volume or bounce to my hair unless I use this stuff. I do have to spray a lot of it on my hair, into my roots and comb it through, wait about 10 min and then blow dry & style. For a wavy look, I spray when wet, scrunch it, & let it air dry. sometimes I even pin curl it for tighter curls, I will dry them just a little on low w/ a cap on. Make sue you shake the product vigorously prior to using it to activate the product!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie M

customer_reviews.title: Sebastian Volup Volume Spray Gel
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It gives you volume without being heavy or sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! Makes my hair so full and easy to manage. In fact, it's time to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Harris

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Makes my fine, thin hair look like I have at least twice as much and it smells so good!. I will be a lifetime fan.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does give some volum. Not histerically a lot. Just slight volum.
customer_reviews.author: jae lee

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. I have very fine hair and this does nothing.
customer_reviews.author: catdog

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the Spray Gel. Adds much body to my freshly washed hair!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Lark

customer_reviews.title: Great hair volumizing product!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this line of products! It smells great and truly adds volume to my hair!! I am so glad that my hairdresser recommended it!!
customer_reviews.author: Julia M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good volume spray. Not remarkable, but definitely better than most drug store brands.
customer_reviews.author: BagMommy

customer_reviews.title: Have enjoyed this product from the start about a year and ...
customer_reviews.text: Have enjoyed this product from the start about a year and a half ago. Love the volume, clean smell, bounce and long lasting benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Best hair product
customer_reviews.text: Only product that works well on my hair. Non-greasy, nice volume and you can use sparingly.
customer_reviews.author: LCM

customer_reviews.title: great...
customer_reviews.text: I love that is sprays onto the hair. makes more even distribution of the product easier. It has great hold.
customer_reviews.author: MyThoughts

customer_reviews.title: ... this to be a very effective volumizing product for fine hair.
customer_reviews.text: I find this to be a very effective volumizing product for fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: ruthann albert

customer_reviews.title: Good Volumizer
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Good smelling and easy to apply. The smell is not girly smelling but just smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Shalina D

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: I have tried numerous products like this and by far this one is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have very soft thin hair and it doesn't take much of this product to give me just enough lift.
customer_reviews.author: onecoolbarbie

customer_reviews.title: Husband's hair looks shiny and full without that "crunchy" look and feel
customer_reviews.text: Finally figured out a way to tell my Husband his hair gel was leaving his chestnut curls "crunchy" ,I suggested he try my Sebastian product AND..... he now has shiny controlled, volume without the "my hair is crunchy and so "80's" separated/spiky that you can see my scalp" look. My Husband is the type who never notices any product I put in his bathroom (he'd probably bathe with dish washing liquid if I let him LOL) imagine how ASTOUNDED I was when he said "I really love this hair gel, honey"!!!! I love how shiny his hair looks!
customer_reviews.author: CHINATOUCHE1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not too heavy, but still helps style the hair. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. It was delivered quickly and I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Life Changer!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't get enough of Sabastian Hair Products. I've been on it around 6-7 months and I'm Baffled at the difference it's made. This Spray was no exception. saved best part last. And the smell is Freakin AmazBalls. SOOOOOOOOOOO GOOOOOOD. I LOVE LOVED IT....
customer_reviews.author: Irish Princess

customer_reviews.title: Adds volume and hold
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for several years and it really does add volume and help with styling and hold.
customer_reviews.author: grayling

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing for my thin hair, and it's not sticky. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Does give hair a lift.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this a couple times since purchasing. I was looking for more of a setting spray, but do like this also. If I don't want to curl my hair I use this before blow drying, for extra volume, then finish with Sebastian Shaper Fierce hair spray.
customer_reviews.author: kfritter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keep my short hair in place and gives it style
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Volume And Shine
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well and does add volume and shine to your hair. It is a very good product to purchase if you have thin or flat hair. I gave it 4 out of 5 stars only because I felt they could have used some more natural ingredients in the product.
customer_reviews.author: SmartShopper

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is magic for my fine, thin hair
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is magic for my fine, thin hair. I bought a travel pack at JCPENNY and it had this in it. I fell in love and used the entire travel size. I live in a hot humid climate and my find thin hair does not do well here. After using this stuff my hair holds up great outdoors in the humidity and appears thicker!! What??? I have tried MANY products for my hair and I LOVE this stuff. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KATIE

customer_reviews.title: Good-bye flat hair!
customer_reviews.text: This WORKS! I have fine (not thin) hair and, when used according to directions, my hair will "hold UP". I shake thoroughly as shown on bottle, spray on damp roots and blow-dry hair set on large curlers. Nothing else has ever worked and this does. Although the expected delivery date given was longer than I had expected for an Amazon shipment, it still arrived within a week, packaged safely. Do order THIS product for the same results; volume "gel" does not work the same way.
customer_reviews.author: Care

customer_reviews.title: Sebastian Volupt Volume Building Spray Gel Unisex 5.07 Ounce
customer_reviews.text: I use this product before I blow dry my hair. This product gives me volume after blow-drying my fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: Ermelinda Pregiato

customer_reviews.title: A must for thinning, fine hair. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Light spray but big volume and hold. Terrific for people with thinning fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not great
customer_reviews.text: I have fine straight hair. If I use too much product, it lays flat. I will order it again, using mousse instead.
customer_reviews.author: amazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. One of the few that add volume without weighing down my thin hair.
customer_reviews.author: Wldflwr

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This spray doesn't build as much volume as I had hoped but still makes my hair feel nice. It smells fantastic and I would recommend others to give it a try atleast- it may work differently on different types of hair.
customer_reviews.author: dgirl1919

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's the best product for me to us before drying my hair...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find in Houston; well worth ordering 4 at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki P. Buxton

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: They sell this at my salon and this price was much better. I like the product very much. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: not sticky at all. Great volume on straight hair. Easy to brush out. doesn't weigh hair down. shake before use.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: I love this gel
customer_reviews.text: I love this gel! It is perfect for my curly, thick hair - it doesn't make it frizzy or to plastic looking.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Pattison

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: This product has a very nice smell, but it has a very weak hold. I have fine hair and I use velcro rollers. This product wasn't really enough to keep my style going all day long. I switched to a Pantene spray gel for fine hair. Much better.
customer_reviews.author: nefarious67

customer_reviews.title: It works and give you a nice natural body
customer_reviews.text: I have very very fine hair.. It's really sad condition but i need to move on, so i tried this product, kinda skeptical tough. But it really give you a nice body to your hair. I'm very pleased and continued to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: beauty999

customer_reviews.title: Defective spray nozzle
customer_reviews.text: Product is good but spray nozzle was defective so I had to transfer the liquid to another container. Ver annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Nicky Socca

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  hair gel if you want volume
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent gel if you live with a lot of humidity! It does not weigh down the hair in any way!
customer_reviews.author: Carole Kosar

customer_reviews.title: Another good purchase from Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product...purchas experience from Amazon was fine,I was very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Spierer

customer_reviews.title: I am older and hair is thinning but this product gives me more volume and it holds curl nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Have used product for some time. I am older and hair is thinning but this product gives me more volume and it holds curl nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Clagett

customer_reviews.title: Works like it did in salon
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. Spray got "stuck". Had to move product to an old spray container I had so I could use.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Kat

customer_reviews.title: Lovin it.
customer_reviews.text: It really adds volume to my hair which is thin and very fine. Will order it again. Love Sebastian. Yea
customer_reviews.author: Nancy P. Venuti

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic  prouduct
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff for fine hair, will not make your hair feel gunky, gives good volume.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy H.

customer_reviews.title: Great styling product
customer_reviews.text: Sebastian has done it again! Volupt Volume Building Spray is a really good hair product. Works wonders when I blow my hair. A little goes a long way. Thank you Amazon for selling it.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. My mum got it originally for me as a Christmas present and I've been hooked every since. It just seems to do to my hair what hairspray, gel, and moose could never do.
customer_reviews.author: davidknows

customer_reviews.title: http://www.amazon.com/gp/aw/d/B0037IESXC/ref=aw_cr_item_title
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty well, takes more product than I would like to use to achieve the desired look for me but maybe my hair is just unruly - it has a nice scent, it leaves hair feeling clean
customer_reviews.author: Doctor G

product_meta.title: Sebastian Volupt Spray, 5.07 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Achieve long-lasting full-on volume with Sebastian Professional Volute Spray. With root-lift technology, this professional hair product provides maximum volume to the hair, while leaving it sensually soft to the touch. It's two-phase formula helps to gain a full-looking hairstyle with extra body and without stickiness.

BRAND STORY
Sebastian Professional provides stylists with new products, tools and techniques, simplifying and solving the challenges hairdressers face every day.
